antiPatterns.name: The Knot
antiPatterns.description: A set of low cohesive services are tightly coupled by hardcoded point-to-point integration and context-specific interfaces.
antiPatterns.consequences: Decrease flexibility, hard to maintain and reducing the reusability of the services. Due to the complex architecture of the services their response times might be higher and they have low availability.
antiPatterns.cause: To complex buisness processe, wrong cuts
